Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.Controller
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.GameController
public class GameController extends Controller
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the GameRefresher to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern. In charge of rendering the game page of the program, is the controller of the FXML based scene.
Author:
fy916

    • Go_to_main

      void Go_to_main​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      FXML method jumps to the main page
      Throws:
      IOException - may throw IOException since it fetches data from external files

    • focus_back

      FXML method when the user focuses on the back button

    • focus_page

      void focus_page​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      FXML method when the user focuses on the page instead of the button

    • goto_gameFinishPage

      public void goto_gameFinishPage​(int type) throws IOException
      Render the game finish page when game ends
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the status of the game, when 0 represents gameover; 1 represents level passed; 2 represents victory
      Throws:
      IOException - May throw IOException since the method reads from the external files for the FXML files

    • renderGame

      public void renderGame​(javafx.scene.Scene input_scene) throws IOException
      Render the game and continously update within the Timeline
      Parameters:
      input_scene - the Scene that the game to be rendered in
      Throws:
      IOException - May throw IOException since the method contains Timeline play
